name: Warriors of the Lost Clan
description:
Densuke Saisei is a young leader determined in protecting his clan from the impending attack of the Takeda Clan, which has suddenly swept over territories of all the other clans in the land. Takeda Shinzo, by means of mysterious powers, breaks through Saisei’s defenses, nearly killing Densuke and conquering his clan. As Densuke is passing, he is offered a  chance at ressurection by the spirit Fuzen. With new found power, Densuke and Fuzen will fight to retake the Saisei Clan and liberate the land from Takeda’s magical threat.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Space - Interact

P - Attack

O - Dash

I - Guard
